channel.title: Draft, 2019 on Knights of Gridiron
channel.description: Recent content in Draft, 2019 on Knights of Gridiron

item.title: 2019 Draft Board
item.description: The 2019 draft is just over a week away! As reigning Champion, Trav will be hosting. Fortunately, we will have all owners in attendance. With 2018 marking the first year for trades and no shortage of them taking place approaching the deadline, there is alot to look at. 2018 Trades: Levi traded a 3rd round pick to Pete for a 12th Trav trades a 3rd round pick to Dan for an 8th Briggs trades 4th round pick to Brett for a 10th Pete trades 3rd round (Levi) and 7th to Scott for a 4th & 10th Trav trades 4th round to Scott for a 7th Kris trades 4th round to Jordan for a 7th Kris trades 10th to Scott for a 12th Josh trades 4th to Jordan for 8th With all of that activity, here is the fallout:
